title: Keep tab name when reconnect
author: Bludwarf
body_snippet:
|Detail|Value|
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75.7011.34996  |

1. Connect to create a new tab
2. Rename this tab
3. Reconnect this tab

The name used to rename the tab is lost because it is replaced by the connection name.
It could be kept to avoid copying the old name, reconnecting and pasting the old name.

iterations.description: Reconnect closes the current tab and creates a new one, so preserving the existing custom tab title is a clear, low-risk UX fix.
